text:
Francis Gregory Stafford (February 9, 1948 – October 11, 2018), usually known as Greg Stafford, was an American game designer and publisher. He was born in Waterbury, Connecticut. He was known for his games "White Bear and Red Moon", "King of Dragon Pass", and "HeroQuest".
Stafford died on October 11, 2018 in Arcata, California at the age of 70.
